captions.text:
I can't hold
My head up

I felt like
I was crying

I can't even look at
Your eyes, I might feel sorry

I called your name
Thousands of millions of times

But I can't anymore as
If I've seen you for the first time

Throw away everything
That I've bought for you

Don't cry and listen
There are a lot of good people

I'll leave first since
I have things to do

I'll leave first since
I have something to do

That's enough I saw
 Your face

I couldn't say anything
But we were together

I'm fine without you
So don't worry

You don't have to be
Sorry, I'm okay now

It's going to be hard at first
It's always like that

When you're awake from
He alcohol everything is done

If I stay here I'm afraid
I might hold on to you

Go back to
your place

One word that says I
Love you why can't I say that

Those days I've ignored 
Thinking it might hurt you

Living is like hell
Even the breathing

The air I'm breathing
In is not helping

That one room apartment
That we talked about

You said that'd
Be enough

You said two spoons
On the table would be okay

You said that it'd be enough
That even if we don't have anything
We can make it happen

We wished that we'd be
Happy with each other

The ring is still
In my finger

But you've left and it's
Still empty

You've left me on ice
That's going to break soon

And ask me to come out
It doesn't work well

I'm afraid that it might
Break if I move

I can't even breath
Or say anything

The promise let's be together
Whatever happens

Common words
I'm fed up by the words

One word that says I
Love you why can't I say that

Those days I've ignored 
Thinking it might hurt you

Tell me that I can
Go back with a smiling face

I've erased all memories
And sadness

(Those words that
I couldn't say)

Love you why
 can't I say that

Those days I've ignored 
Thinking it might hurt you

It's making me suffer
Since I dream of it

Those days I
Couldn't forget about you

comments.author: Ian Chan

comments.text:
+馬君 Ji Hyo, Kim Jong Kook, HaHa and Gary is my bias. And I don't care in 
China Beauty Surgery is popular or not. Ji Hyo just rocks. Do NOT CRITICIZE

comments.author: Lian Ya Ting

comments.text:
+馬君 lol jihyo is definitely considered beautiful by korean "standards." I'm 
going to speculate you're Chinese, like your username above suggests. It's 
only granted that there is a barrier between what YOU know about korean 
aesthetics compared what koreans know. You said you've done some research 
about these topics, correct? Then tell me- what do you mean by korean 
beauty standards anyways? Double eyelids? Chubby cheeks? High nose? As a 
Korean myself, those are conventional expectations that some (not all) of 
us have towards our female celebrities. Haha, how ironic: Jihyo seems to 
have all of these features and an interestingly charming personality, which 
is a bonus. The "top layer" of korean actresses that you mentioned excludes 
jihyo. haha, in what world? Go to naver, korea's #1 search/news/media site 
and type '송,' which is the first part of her stage name. if you did your 
"research" you will see that she ranks higher than song joong ki and song 
hye kyo. True, running man has definitely boosted her popularity but aren't 
celebrities these days defined by their popularity rather than their 
talent? That's why we use descriptions such as "underrated" and 
"under-appreciated" towards a few stars.

If you're really being "objective," you wouldn't rank people in terms of 
how they look, because everybody has their own opinions on beauty. However, 
if you really want to discuss beauty in an evenhanded manner, i have no 
problem in discussing facial proportions, symmetries, and beauty ratios 
with you.
comments.author: officialpaullee

comments.text:

comments.text:
+馬君 Jihyo is beautiful. Be it that you think she's beautiful or not but I'm 
quite sure that many of her fans think she's really considered beautiful. 
Please don't be judgmental and rank people in terms of how they look 
because different people have different opinions. So what if she's not 
"beautiful" in your eyes? What really matters is that she has a great 
personality that's a 1000x better than yours for sure. I may be "a little 
hard on you" but I don't get why you always dislike Jihyo without a logical 
reason as said previously. 
And who cares about the stupid Korean standards that was mentioned above? 
And who are you to say that she's not beautiful? I'm not sure about you but 
you seem jealous about this haha. Please don't use vulgarities to cover 
this up when you know you're losing the conversation, it won't look good on 
you. Oh yes, I'm sorry if you feel offended but this was just a personal 
opinion (:
